org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.distrib

Class GitCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.distrib.GitCommand

  • public class GitCommand
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple wrapper around the git(1) command.

      • GitCommand

        public GitCommand(java.io.File dir,
          java.lang.String... params)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        dir - repository filesystem location (i.e., the directory containing .git as a subdirectory)
        params - the command line arguments (not including the initial "git")

      • GitCommand

        public GitCommand(java.io.File dir,
          java.util.List<java.lang.String> params)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        dir - repository filesystem location (i.e., the directory containing .git as a subdirectory)
        params - the command line arguments (not including the initial "git")
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if dir is null

    • Method Detail

      • getArgs

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getArgs()
        Get command line arguments.

      • run

        public int run()
        Run command. Equivalent to run(false).

      • run

        public int run(boolean errorOk)
        Run command.
        Parameters:
        errorOk - true if a non-zero exit value may be expected
        Returns:
        git(1) exit value; if errorOk is false this will always be zero
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this command has already been run
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the current thread is interrupted
        GitException - if any GIT_* environment variables are set
        GitException - if errorOk is false and git(1} exits with a non-zero value

      • runAndGetOutput

        public java.lang.String runAndGetOutput()
        Run command and return standard output, interpreted as a UTF-8 string, with leading and trailing whitespace trimmed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this command has already been run
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the current thread is interrupted
        GitException - if any GIT_* environment variables are set
        GitException - if git(1} exits with a non-zero value

      • getStandardOutput

        public java.lang.String getStandardOutput()
        Get the standard output from git(1).
        Returns:
        command standard output interpreted as UTF-8
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if command has not yet completed

      • getStandardError

        public java.lang.String getStandardError()
        Get the standard error from git(1).
        Returns:
        command standard error interpreted as UTF-8
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if command has not yet completed

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
